articles.author: IVAN MORENO Associated Press
articles.title: Experts: Travel bans, business closures could hurt economy
articles.description: Experts say travel restrictions and business closures aimed at stopping the spread of a new virus that has killed 259 people in China could end up hurting rather than helping the situation
articles.content:
MILWAUKEE -- 
Travel restrictions and business closures aimed at stopping the spread of a new virus that has killed 259 people in China could end up causing ripple effects that harm the global economy, experts say.
When you stop planes and ships, trains and… [+2730 chars]

articles.author: Luis Martinez
articles.title: Pentagon to provide housing support to HHS for evacuees over coronavirus concerns
articles.description: Defense officials say all the care, transport and security will come from HHS.
articles.content:
The Defense Department on Saturday approved housing support for up to 1,000 people should they need to be quarantined upon return from their overseas travel due to the coronavirus outbreak, according to a statement.

articles.author: Associated Press
articles.title: Apple temporarily closes stores in China amid virus outbreak
articles.description: Apple is temporarily closing its 42 stores in mainland China, one of its largest markets, as a new virus spreads rapidly and the death toll there rose to 259 on Saturday
articles.content:
SAN FRANCISCO -- 
Apple is temporarily closing its 42 stores in mainland China, one of its largest markets, as a new virus spreads rapidly and the death toll there rose to 259 on Saturday.

articles.title: New virus has infected more than 11,900 globally
articles.description: A viral outbreak that began in China has infected more than 11,900 people
articles.content:
A viral outbreak that began in China has infected more than 11,900 people globally. 
Cases confirmed as of Saturday evening in Beijing:
China: 11,791 cases on the mainland. In addition, Hong Kong has 12 cases and Macao has five. Most of the 259 deaths have … [+425 chars]

articles.author: Marc Nathanson
articles.title: Airline removes gas mask-wearing passenger after he panics travelers
articles.description: American Airlines removed a mysterious gas mask-wearing man from a Houston-bound flight and rebooked him on another plane after passengers became panicked.
articles.content:
American Airlines removed a mysterious gas mask-wearing man from a Houston-bound flight and rebooked him on another plane after passengers became panicked, airline officials said.
The presence of the man, whose gas mask completely hid his face, unnerved many… [+1715 chars]

articles.title: 195 Americans are quarantined because of coronavirus. What does that mean?

articles.content:
